parameters.name: 取引先責任者(EA Starter Pack)

computedFields.name: SubGraphDim1
computedFields.label: 取引先ソース(カスタムSub)

computedFields.name: SubGraphDim2
computedFields.label: 取引先 評価(カスタムSub)

computedFields.name: MainGraphDim2
computedFields.label: 取引先ソース(カスタム)

computedFields.name: MainGraphDim3
computedFields.label: 取引先 評価(カスタム)

computedFields.name: IsClosed
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when toDate('ActivityDate_sec_epoch') < now() then "true"
         else "false" end
computedFields.label: 完了フラグ

parameters.name: キャンペーンメンバー(EA Starter Pack)
キャンペーン(EA Starter Pack)

computedFields.name: LastCloseDate_Days_Range
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when 'LastCloseDate' is null then null
     when daysBetween(toDate('LastCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 10 then "01. < 10日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('LastCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 30 then "02. < 30日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('LastCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 60 then "03. < 60日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('LastCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 90 then "04. < 90日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('LastCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 180 then "05. < 180日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('LastCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 365 then "06. < 1年"
     else "07. >= 1年" end
computedFields.label: 最終受注経過日数帯

computedFields.name: FirstCloseDate_Days_Range
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when 'FirstCloseDate' is null then null
     when daysBetween(toDate('FirstCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 10   then "01. < 10日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('FirstCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 30   then "02. < 30日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('FirstCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 60   then "03. < 60日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('FirstCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 90   then "04. < 90日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('FirstCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 180  then "05. < 180日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('FirstCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 365  then "06. < 1年"
     when daysBetween(toDate('FirstCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 730  then "07. < 2年"
     when daysBetween(toDate('FirstCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 1095 then "08. < 3年"
     when daysBetween(toDate('FirstCloseDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 1460 then "09. < 4年"
     else "10. >= 5年" end
computedFields.label: 初回受注経過日数帯

computedFields.name: ActivityWhatType
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when starts_with('WhatId', "500") then "3.ケース"
         when starts_with('WhatId', "006") then "2.商談"
         when starts_with('WhatId', "001") then "1.取引先"
         else "4.その他" end
computedFields.label: 関連先種別

computedFields.name: ActivityDate_Days_Range
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when 'ActivityDate' is null then null
     when daysBetween(toDate('ActivityDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 10 then "01. < 10日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('ActivityDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 30 then "02. < 30日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('ActivityDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 60 then "03. < 60日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('ActivityDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 90 then "04. < 90日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('ActivityDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 180 then "05. < 180日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('ActivityDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 365 then "06. < 1年"
     else "07. >= 1年" end
computedFields.label: 活動経過日数帯

computedFields.name: ProbabilityRange
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when 'Probability' >= 10 and 'Probability' < 30 then "≧ 10"
         when 'Probability' >= 30 and 'Probability' < 60 then "≧ 30"
         when 'Probability' >= 60 and 'Probability' < 100 then "≧ 60"
         else null end
computedFields.label: 確度帯

computedFields.name: Fiscal_CloseDate_m
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when 'FiscalFirstMonth' == "1" then
     case when 'CloseDate_Month' == "01" then "01.  1月"
          when 'CloseDate_Month' == "02" then "02.  2月"
          when 'CloseDate_Month' == "03" then "03.  3月"
          when 'CloseDate_Month' == "04" then "04.  4月"
          when 'CloseDate_Month' == "05" then "05.  5月"
          when 'CloseDate_Month' == "06" then "06.  6月" 
          when 'CloseDate_Month' == "07" then "07.  7月" 
          when 'CloseDate_Month' == "08" then "08.  8月"

          when 'CloseDate_Month' == "10" then "10"
          when 'CloseDate_Month' == "11" then "11"
          when 'CloseDate_Month' == "12" then "12"
          else null end
     end
computedFields.label: FiscalMonthDiv

computedFields.name: CaseDays
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when 'IsClosed' == "false" then daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'), now())
else daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'), toDate('ClosedDate_sec_epoch')) end
computedFields.label: 問合せ対応日数

computedFields.name: CreatedDate_Days_Range
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when 'CreatedDate' is null then null
     when daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 1 then "01. < 1日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 2 then "02. < 2日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 5 then "03. < 5日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 10 then "04. < 10日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 30 then "05. < 30日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 60 then "06. < 60日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 90 then "07. < 90日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 180 then "08. < 180日"
     when daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'),now()) < 365 then "09. < 1年"
     else "10. >= 1年" end
computedFields.label: リード作成経過日数帯

description: Extract, load, and transform for application [Einstein Analytics Starter Pack].
name: Einstein_Analytics_Starter_Pack
